section_title: Powers of court on hearing complaint for affiliation order and on appeal.
section_text: 1 1 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  4 The following enactments are hereby repealed:— a . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  c in section 30(3) of the  Maintenance Orders (Reciprocal Enforcement) Act 1972, paragraph (b) and the word “and” immediately preceding it.

4 1 This Act may be cited as the Affiliation Proceedings (Amendment) Act 1972. 2 This Act shall not extend to Scotland or  . . . to Northern Ireland. 3 This Act shall come into force at the expiration of the period of three months beginning with the day on which it is passed.
